content: meet **rori the raptor ** the cuddliest dinosaur you ll ever crochet designed by the incredibly talented *megan kreiner* for marlybird com 1 rori brings prehistoric fun to life with bold personality vibrant colors and a whole lot of texture perfect for kids and adults who are still young at heart this lovable raptor is ready to stomp into playrooms nurseries or cuddle-time adventures crafted with plush chunky yarn rori is irresistibly soft and squishy ideal for snuggles and play from her playful claws to her toothy grin every stitch adds to her charm making her a standout project for dinosaur lovers and crochet enthusiasts alike whether you make rori for a gift decor or just because she s too cute to resist this project is a roaring good time designed with thoughtful details and easy-to-follow instructions trust the pattern and go with it this pattern is accessible for adventurous crocheters who are ready to bring rori to life grab your hook pick your favorite yarn colors and start stitching your very own prehistoric pal today about the designer megan kreiner s expert touch and whimsical designs make her creations truly special her imaginative style shines through in rori showcasing her love for playful handmade characters read more about megan s work on the blog here meet megan kreiner 2 get ready to unleash your creativity and add a dash of prehistoric magic to your **crochet collection with rori the raptor** the dino friend you didn t know you needed also available for free on marlybird com 3 **finished measurements** dinosaur is 25 63 5 cm body circumference by 34 86 5 cm long nose to tail 1 https //marlybird com 2 https //marlybird com/blog/mk-crochet-megan-kreiner/ 3 https //marlybird com/blog/dinosaur-plush-crochet-free-pattern-create-rori-the-raptor/
